\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Internal audit implies a systematic inspection of meeting QMS requirements \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/FghvFQ\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Internal Audit collected audit evidence against audit criteria represent internal audit findings (IAFs). IAFs can indicate either conformity or nonconformity with audit criteria, and can also lead to identification of opportunities for improvement or recording good practices. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have questions regarding this section, please seek assistance from your Manager or contact us through \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/ess.do?orderitem=caQMSSupportRequestsTrainingSupportRequest#complete\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"QMS Training Support\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
